name: TennisOfTheDead (WIP)
description:
A Simple tennis game being made to look like it was made for the original gameboy.

I envision this project to be a simple game to pass time with a friend at your side. I have a lot to do yet (I just started this project):

- Enemy A.I
- Local Multiplayer

- K.O
- Skills

- Functional Score and health system
- Menus

You can expect updates to be released every Sunday.

I'm doing this project with lots of love and care, so i hope you will have fun with it.
